#Text=Borneo bridge collapse : death toll reaches four , many remain missing
#Text=Sunday , November 27 , 2011
#Text=The death toll from yesterday 's suspension bridge collapse on the Indonesian island of Borneo has risen from three to four , with a six-month-old baby among the dead .
#Text=Search and rescue teams continue to look for survivors in the Mahakam River .
#Text=The initial death toll was raised at first to five , but was revised back down to four .

#Text=The number of wounded rose from at least seventeen to at least nineteen , but Monsters and Critics offers a figure as high as 39 injured ; Indonesia Today yesterday suggested the actual figure was 100 hospitalised .
#Text=Roughly 40 people remain missing at the scene in East Kalimantan 's Kutai Kartanegara district , where " Kalimantan 's Golden Gate Bridge " linked the towns of Tenggarong and Samarinda .

column1: #Text=At least three cars , several motorbikes , and at least one public bus all fell into the Mahakam River .
#Text=Another car was left overturned and balanced upon wreckage over the water .

#Text=State-owned builders PT Hutama Karya completed the bridge about a decade ago in the image of California 's Golden Gate Bridge , and it is now reported it was under repair at the time of the failure .
#Text=New information suggests a cable on the 720-metre structure failed as workers dealt with it ; six of the repair crew are among the missing .
#Text=Kutai Kartanegara Bridge .
#Text=Image : Ezagren .
#Text=National police representative Boy Rafly Amar said " It is believed that some victims are still in the river .

#Text= It happened so fast , only about 30 seconds , " according to National Disaster Management Agency spokesman Sutopo Nugoroho .

column1: #Text=National search and rescue head Daryatmo said Monday will see cranes attempt to move debris .

#Text=The president , Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono , has sent three ministers to the site to investigate the accident , while Bambang Widaryatmo , head of East Kalimantan 's police , promised " parties found to be negligent will be prosecuted " .
#Text=The government has promised a replacement ferry service .

#Text=The river is closed to boats as rescue operations continue , and a 22-strong team has been dispatched from the national police , comprising six forensics experts , five disaster victim identification specialists , and eleven investigators .
#Text=They are there to augment the East Kalimantan Police .
#Text=Some people swam ashore after falling , with the aftermath filled with screams .
#Text=40-year-old Adam Nur describes breaking free from a car and swimming 300 metres with one arm after his other arm was injured in the fall .
#Text=Syakrani , 24 , says he survived by clinging to empty plastic containers when he fell from the bridge after leaving his truck to investigate a traffic jam .
#Text=" The authorities should have closed the bridge if it was under repair , " he said .
#Text=This story has updates
#Text=See Death toll from Borneo bridge collapse reaches eleven , November 28 , 2011
